entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-03
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • Build failed: Validate-DotNet/main installer, .NET 5 SDK 5.0.4xx, validation-installer-.NET 5 SDK 5.0.4xx #installer-101408-.NET5SDK5.0.4xx #11496
  • Build failed: Validate-DotNet/main real signed, installer, .NET 6.0.1xx SDK, validation-installer-.NET 6.0.1xx SDK #installer-102496-.NET6.0.1xxSDK #11584
  • Build failed: Validate-DotNet/main real signed, installer, .NET 6.0.1xx SDK RC 1, validation-installer-.NET 6.0.1xx SDK RC 1 #installer-102457-.NET6.0.1xxSDKRC1 #11587
  • Build failed: Validate-DotNet/main .NET 5 SDK 5.0.2xx, validation-installer-.NET 5 SDK 5.0.2xx, installer #installer-103881-.NET5SDK5.0.2xx #11689

Updated

  • Please provide patch-agnostic URLs for runtime downloads #11040

PullRequests

Created

  • Add support for s390x architecture #11874
  • [ArPow] Fix overrides of runtime package versions #11873

Updated

  • Retarget DOTNETHOME when installing x64 on ARM64 #11843
  • [ArPow] Update previous source-built #11705
  • THIRD-PARTY-NOTICES.HTML #11617
